title: Kristen Wiig
summary: Kristen Carroll Wiig[1] (/wɪɡ/; born August 22, 1973)[2] is an American actress, comedian and writer. Born in Canandaigua, New York, she was raised in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, and Rochester, New York. Wiig later relocated to Los Angeles, where she joined the improvisational comedy troupe The Groundlings and made her television debut in 2003.
